feed.title: Draft BIP : fixed-schedule block size increase

entry.title: Draft BIP : fixed-schedule block size increase
entry.summary: On June 22, 2015 Gavin Andresen wrote to a group promising to write a BIP after he implemented the increase-the-maximum-block-size code. The corresponding URL is no longer available, and the BIP has moved to another location. Dr. Carsten Otto, from andrena objects ag, provided updated contact information in his message signature, including their website and upcoming events.
